summary: Dr. Christian Evans, M.D., surrendered his medical license to avoid further charges for non-compliance with a prior Consent Order. The initial Consent Order, issued on November 12, 2019, reprimanded him and placed him on probation for two years due to findings of unprofessional conduct, including sending unwelcome, sexually suggestive messages and making inappropriate comments to female staff members. His license surrender, effective March 5, 2020, was a voluntary act to avoid complying with the previous disciplinary terms.
